name: Dolphins Dice Slots Deluxe
description:
With three different free games features and the crabby Crab Jackpot, there's nothing fishy about this game...

During normal play the Dolphin is wild and substitutes for all symbols except scattered clams.

3 or more clams triggers the Tentacle Treasure Feature. The Octopus holds 6 features in her mighty tentacles. Roll the dice and a feature is chosen!

The Dolphin Dice Feature.
The Dolphin Dice screen appears with Spins on the left and Multiplier on the right. The Octopus allows you to roll a dice to increase either spins or multiplier for the free games. During the Dolphin Dice free games special dice appear on reels 2, 3 and 4. These dice are wildcards and also increase your multiplier on winning paylines only!

The Golden Chest Feature.
The Golden Chest screen appears with 10 underwater treasure chests. The Octopus allows you to select either 3 or 6 chests. In each chest are either 3, 7 or 10 free games. The free games wins are all paid at triple normal pays.
During the free games a new Golden Chest symbol is added to reels 1, 3 and 5. Each time a Golden Chest appears the free games multiplier increases by 1 and all Dolphin Wildcards on screen lock in place until the next spin in which no Golden Chests appear. There is no maximum multiplier! If no Golden Chests appear in a spin then all wildcards unlock and the multiplier returns to 3.

The Wild Dolphin Feature.

Never seen a dolphin in a tuxedo? You have now, and he is wild and triples your wins! You'll be swimming in cash! The Wild Dolphin Feature awards 20 free games with all wins tripled.

Every 5 free games played one additional Wildcard Dolphin is added to each reels AND the lowest paying symbol is removed from the reels. A maximum of 5 Tuxedo Dolphins per reel can be awarded. Once all 9, 10, J, Q, K, A symbols have been removed from the reels no further symbols are removed.

The Crab Jackpot - win up to 750,000 virtual dollars!

The Octopus can award the crab jackpot - and you can also win it during free games when 3 gold crab symbols appear.

Open any 6 crab traps to reveal 2, 3 or 4 crabs inside. You need 10 crabs to fill each crab-o-tron. If you fill both crab-o-trons you win the jackpot! If you don't fill both crab-o-trons you win a consolation prize per crab found.

This game is for entertainment purposes only. No real money can be won or lost.

The odds of winning in this simulation are not the same as in real slot machines. Real slot machines are designed to make you consistently lose.

You must be aged 18 (or 21 in some areas) to gamble.

Pokie Magic supports responsible gambling and appropriate parental supervision.
